item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar- “RPI MAX: Setting Goals and Reviewing Results”
item.description:
Description: This seminar will establish the positive effect of transforming the traditional role of planner and evaluator solely from the people-leader to a shared responsibility between leader and direct report. This shift builds collective ownership and allows the leader to focus on coaching and developing throughout the performance cycle.
